page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
In 1985 Egmanton, Laxton and Moorhouse are thriving village communities with a cross section of people and interests. Behind rural facades the twentieth century lurks; computers, videos, micro_wave ovens and snooker tables are found; television provides entertainment but so do pianos and harvest suppers. History still permeates our lives so we finish with part of the Pilgrims' hymn:_ "When Edward Confessor served God as our King With glad hymns of faith then this valley did ring."
Acknowledgements. Egmanton WI with help from a council member of the Notts Trust for Nature Conservation.
